1    | /**************************************************************************
2    | $Header: DIALOG.C Fri 10-27-2000 8:47:18 pm HvA V2.01 $
3    | 
4    | DESC: Dialog routines for HVA_WIN
5    | HIST: 19900818 V1.00
6    | 	  20001027 V2.01 - Adapting for DJGPP
7    | ***************************************************************************/
8    | 
9    | /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10   |                         HEADER FILES
11   | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
12   | #include <stdio.h>
13   | #include <stdlib.h>
14   | #include <string.h>
15   | #include <stdarg.h>
16   | #include <ctype.h>
17   | #include "keys.h"
18   | #include "video/v_video.h"
19   | #include "window.h"
20   | 
21   | /*--------------------
22   |   Dialog attributes
23   | ---------------------*/
24   | int m_att = (16*RED+YELLOW) & 0x7F;
25   | int b_att = (16*RED+YELLOW) & 0x7F;
26   | 
27   | /*#+func-----------------------------------------------------------------------
28   |     FUNCTION: wn_dialog()
29   |      PURPOSE: Perform a dialog with user
30   |  DESCRIPTION: -
31   |      RETURNS: choise made by user
32   |      HISTORY: 922024 V0.3
33   | --#-func----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
34   | int wn_dialog(int row, int col, int nchoices, MENU *menu, int ntitles, ...)
35   | {
36   |   int     i,j,height,width=0,choiselen=0,titlelen=0;
37   |   unsigned int key;
38   |   int     choise_row;
39   |   int     tabs[25],select;
40   |   char    *titles[25];
41   |   int     xsize;
42   |   WINDOW  *window;
43   |   va_list arg_marker;
44   | 
45   |   /*------------------------------------------
46   |     Get the titles by va_start and calculate
47   |     the width, needed for the titles. Store
48   |     this value in 'titlelen'
49   |   -------------------------------------------*/
50   |   va_start(arg_marker,ntitles);
51   |   for (i=0 ; i<ntitles ; i++)
52   |   {
53   |     titles[i] = va_arg(arg_marker,char *);
54   |     titlelen = max(titlelen,strlen(titles[i]));
55   |   }
56   | 
57   |   /*------------------------------------------------
58   |     Calculate the width, needed for
59   |     the options (choises). Store it in 'choiselen'
60   |   -------------------------------------------------*/
61   |   choiselen = nchoices - 1;
62   |   for (i=0 ; i<nchoices ; i++)
63   |     choiselen += (strlen(menu[i].header) + 2);
64   | 
65   |   width  =  max(titlelen,choiselen)+4;
66   |   height =  ntitles + 6;
67   |   row    =  row - height/2;
68   |   choise_row = row + height - 4;
69   | 
70   |   wn_log("*** START DIALOG\n");
71   |   wn_log_indent(+2);
72   | 
73   |   /*------------------------
74   |     Open the dialog window
75   |   -------------------------*/
76   |   wn_log("open window");
77   |   window = wn_open(_DOUBLE_LINE, row, col-width/2, width, height,m_att,b_att);
78   | 
79   |   /*---------------------------------------
80   |     Print test of dialog menu (titles)
81   |   ---------------------------------------*/
82   |   wn_log("print titles");
83   |   for (i=0 ; i<ntitles ; i++)
84   |     printcenter(row+i+1, col, titles[i]);
85   | 
86   |   /*---------------------------------
87   |     Draw the 'choise' boxes
88   |     The default box is double lined
89   |   ----------------------------------*/
90   |   wn_log("print boxes");
91   |   j = col - choiselen/2;
92   |   for (i=0 ; i<nchoices ; i++)
93   |   {
94   |     tabs[i] = j-2;
95   |     xsize = strlen(menu[i].header);
96   |     if (!i)
97   |     {
98   |       wn_setbox(_DOUBLE_LINE);
99   |       v_drawbox(choise_row, tabs[i], xsize+2, 3, m_att);
100  |     }
101  |     else
102  |     {
103  |       wn_setbox(_SINGLE_LINE);
104  |       v_drawbox(choise_row, tabs[i], xsize+2, 3,  b_att);
105  |     }
106  |     v_setattrib_area(choise_row,   tabs[i]+1, xsize, 1, m_att);
107  |     hotstring(choise_row+1, tabs[i]+1, menu[i].hotkey, menu[i].header, m_att);
108  |     j += strlen(menu[i].header) + 5;
109  |   }
110  | 
111  |   select = 0;
112  |   while (TRUE)
113  |   {
114  |     key = waitkey();
115  |     wn_log("key pressed = %d",key);
116  | 
117  |     /*-----------------------------------------------
118  |       If hotkey defined, make this the new key value
119  |     ------------------------------------------------*/
120  |     switch(key)
121  |     {
122  |       case ENTER:
123  |         if (menu[select].hotkey != -1)
124  |           key = menu[select].header[menu[select].hotkey];
125  |         break;
126  |       default:
127  |         break;
128  |     }
129  | 
130  |     switch (key)
131  |     {
132  |       case ESC:
133  |         {
134  |           wn_setbox(_SINGLE_LINE);     /* Restore default */
135  |           window = wn_close(window);
136  |           wn_log_indent(-2);
137  |           wn_log("*** END DIALOG\n");
138  |           return(ESC);
139  |         }
140  |         break;
141  | 
142  |       case ARROW_LEFT:
143  |         if (nchoices != 1)
144  |         {
145  |           wn_setbox(_SINGLE_LINE);
146  |           v_drawbox(choise_row, tabs[select],
147  |                   strlen(menu[select].header)+2, 3, b_att);
148  |           select = (--select + nchoices) % nchoices;
149  |           wn_setbox(_DOUBLE_LINE);
150  |           v_drawbox(choise_row, tabs[select],
151  |                   strlen(menu[select].header)+2, 3, m_att);
152  |         }
153  |         continue;
154  | 
155  |       case ARROW_RIGHT:
156  |         if (nchoices != 1)
157  |         {
158  |           wn_setbox(_SINGLE_LINE);
159  |           v_drawbox(choise_row, tabs[select],
160  |                   strlen(menu[select].header)+2, 3, b_att);
161  |           select = ++select % nchoices;
162  |           wn_setbox(_DOUBLE_LINE);
163  |           v_drawbox(choise_row, tabs[select],
164  |                   strlen(menu[select].header)+2, 3, m_att);
165  |         }
166  |         continue;
167  | 
168  |       case F1:
169  |         help(menu[select].help);
170  |         continue;
171  | 
172  |       /*--------------------------------------
173  |       | No hotkey defined for this popup menu
174  |       ----------------------------------------*/
175  |       case ENTER:
176  |         wn_hide(window);       /* Hide it before actions */
177  |         do_action(menu,select);
178  |         if (menu[select].flags & EXIT)
179  |         {
180  |           window = wn_close(window);
181  |           wn_log_indent(-2);
182  |           wn_log("*** END DIALOG\n");
183  |           return(select);
184  |         }
185  |         else
186  |         {
187  |           wn_unhide(window);
188  |           continue;
189  |         }
190  |         break;
191  | 
192  |       /*--------------------
193  |       | React on hotkey
194  |       --------------------*/
195  |       default:
196  |         if (key > 31 && key < 128)
197  |         {
198  |           for (i=0 ; i<nchoices ; i++)
199  |           {
200  |             if (toupper(key) == toupper(menu[i].header[menu[i].hotkey]))
201  |             {
202  |               wn_hide(window);
203  |               do_action(menu,i);
204  |               if (menu[i].flags & EXIT)
205  |               {
206  |                 window = wn_close(window);
207  |                 wn_log_indent(-2);
208  |                 wn_log("*** END DIALOG\n");
209  |                 return(toupper(key));
210  |               }
211  |               else
212  |               {
213  |                 wn_unhide(window);
214  |                 wn_setbox(_SINGLE_LINE);    /* Restore default */
215  |                 break;
216  |               }
217  |             }
218  |           }
219  |         } /* for (i=0 ; ... */
220  |     } /* switch(key) */
221  |   } /* while (TRUE) */
222  | 
223  |   wn_setbox(_SINGLE_LINE);     /* Restore default */
224  |   return(ESC);
225  | }
226  | 
